content.detailedDescription:
The only way to see it was in playback with slo-mo video recording setting on my iphone 6 plus, i couldn't see it with the naked eye. i just had a feeling to record and i'd capture something. when i viewed the video, and i saw what looked like a star coming out of a cloud, it's decent changed slightly in angle of decent then flew off my screen. i made a still of the object, and it appears to be square but yet cone shaped. i noticed it's been quite active with faster then sight activity lately. i made a video presentation of it.

http://youtu.Be/gbyl0kwofzc
content.summary: The only way to see it was with slo-mo setting on my iphone 6 plus

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking some pictures of the beautiful night sky, venus and jupiter were easily visible right after the sunset.

i took some long exposures, and noticed on the camera screen a green-blue glowing object, but assumed that it was some sky element, such a star cluster or something alike.

i took around 8 pictures of the couple planets and when i downloaded to laptop i noticed the "orb" and tryed to figure out what it was on several online starcharts, including the free stelarium software.

for my surprise, nothing there to spot like the pictures...I was wondering what is this, if i caught a simple sky object (i could not find it on strelar charts) or is something else? the pics were taken around 19:20 hours, thanks a lot.

no sound, and disapeared in the sequence photos of the same place. i used a nikon d40x with several exposures and different iso.

thanks a lot for your attention, my kindest regards

erico
content.summary: Strange green-blue light shown after download pics to computer

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing a gross reservoir very early in the morning with a friend, we where there before the park opened and decided to fish anyway.  just before the sun was about to rise (the sky was just staring to lighten) i heard a buzzing sound echoing through the valley. it sounded alot like a florescent light that is going bad, but much louder.  i looked across the lake and saw two objects moving slowly just above the surface of the water. (after measuring on a map of gross rez they were about 1000ft away from me) my mind could not categorize the objects, first i thought they were birds because the were moving about the same speed, maybe 15-20 mph. they were flying about 5 feet from the surface. they were flying in formation 15 ft apart from each other.  as the got closer the buzzing sound got louder. this portion of the event lasted about 20 seconds. they were moving around a corner of the lake towards me, it seemed like they may have noticed us and immediately accelerated and flew over the nearest mountain and low elevation in a matter of a second or two. they made a sound like a jet flying very fast after the acceleration. unfortunately, my friends never saw the objects as he was around the corner but heard them coming and leave after they accelerated. 
  my main impression of the two objects was the fact that they did not have a surface, they radiated black light similar to a star bu in reverse. the centers had a white light but not very bright. the edges were very "wavery". i closest thing i can compare them to are ghosts, (long story but relevant at the time of sighting, (im not crazy, ive just had some strange experiences in my life)) 
   i am reporting this now because of a report i found on the mufon map that sounded very similar in the same location. case #40732. it is my belief that these objects were probably military as they made a sound unlike most ufo sightings.
content.summary: Pair of "star like" objects,r adiating  "black light" and white light at centers, about the size of a hot tub

content.detailedDescription: One afternoon my sister and i observed a metallic disk like object with lights going around center and at very bottom that was hovering in tree line beside road on lan yair golf course. we pulled into median to observe it for a few minutes and observed a change in the light pattern that was flashing around the center. we then pulled into star lanes bowling alley parking lot to observe to get out of the road and as my sister was turning i practically stuck my head out the window to keep my eye on it and i observed it just zip away at an incredible speed over rd and over us and over the bowling alley in like one second flat it was just gone. if i had not been turned around in my seat i would've missed it just blast away in a second flat. it made no noise at all.
content.summary: Object was hovering in tree line beside road, we pulled into median to observe then pulled into bowling alley parking lot to observe and as my sister was turning i observed it just zip away at an incredible speed over rd and over us and bowling alley

content.detailedDescription:
during reporters interview on bbc tv on salisbury plain regarding an accident involving military personnel.  
towards the end of the report a large flying object was seen to fly very fast over his head, when slowed it look like a flying rod the type that hit the headlines a few years ago but this one was very bright. if you bring up the report you will see it for yourself it is about 52 seconds in to the report. i am surprised that no one else has reported this.  
 if you would like to phone me instead of e.Mail i don't mind.
 see photograph of video
 as a matter of interest a shooting star was seen a few seconds before.
content.summary: Fast flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my telescope looking at venus, jupiter and saturn on 6/22/2015 around 10:30 at night. i was trying to find sagittarius when i noticed a small round light moving directly above me. it had a cone or triangle of light projecting forward as it moved. at first i thought it might be an airplane traveling through some high clouds, but there were no clouds that night. there were no other navigation lights or any sound. it seemed much too low to be a satellite (i have seen many of those in the sky). i would estimate it at 3000-5000ft altitude but it could be much higher. i quickly called out my 23 year old son to look at it. he followed it with binoculars while i turned my 80mm refractor on it. i followed it across the sky directly north. in the telescope i could see it was just a round disc of light with no other colors. the cone of white light was probably 10 times the diameter of the disc. it moved about the speed of a small fast propeller plane but with no sound or lights. as it moved further away, the cone of light seemed to shroud the disc. it then disappeared to the north. my son could not figure out what it was either. minutes later i heard a helicopter to the north but could not see it. there was no trail in the sky at all. i saw many small meteors that night but this was not a meteor. i have no idea what this was.
content.summary: White orb like a star or satellite with a cone of white light projecting forward. the cone then shrouded the white light as it moved in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a student at the university of west florida in pensacola, and was the news director for the campus tv show. we were allowed to use the studio and editing equipment after hours at the local pbs station (a deal with uwf for broadcasting students). that pbs station, wsre-tv is located at 1000 college boulevard in pensacola.
“after hours” usually meant late night hours. i was working late with a fellow student [s.D.] (he did the sports reporting for our tv show), and he drove us there and back in his car. all i remember about his car was that it was compact and white. (can’t remember make & model – but that doesn’t really matter). i sat in the front passenger seat as we left the station about 2 a.M. and s.D. was driving us back to campus.
the drive to/from uwf’s campus from wsre is about a 10-15 minute drive, and you have to get on university parkway, which is a straight shot for several (under 3) miles, right to campus.
there are small rolling hills along this road and we noticed what appeared to be car headlights ahead. but the weird thing was that every time we took a dip down one of the hills, they wouldn’t disappear, and they were seemingly in the same spot at the crests…. like the ‘car’ wasn’t moving toward us. we continued toward campus wondering aloud about this. 
driving toward uwf, university parkway is wide and dead-ends on campus blvd. it is a large, wide intersection. when we arrived at the intersection, we saw that the lights were not from a car, but a craft hovering above the pine trees just in the back of the corner gas station (i think it was also a 7-11 type place, but it closed shortly after this episode and isn’t there any more.)
of course this was an amazing thing to see, and s.D. stopped the car in the intersection, as we both looked up at this triangular-shaped craft. he was scared speechless, i was completely fascinated. i opened the car door and s.D. started yelling “don’t get out!”
but i was awestruck and wanted to get closer. but the moment my foot hit the ground the ufo took off at high speed to my right, into the night sky, at a 45-degree angle. it seemed to know the second i was there, and it’s “headlights” turned off the same moment it took off. it was totally silent. no whirring or engine noise at all, it didn’t need to accelerate; it just took off and was out of sight in a second or two. this was not technology we had then, or now. 
i know pensacola has been a hot spot for ufo sightings over the years, and many people brush if off due to the close-by military base(s). but i was close to this thing. maybe 120 feet away, as it hovered over a pine tree that was perhaps 50 feet tall. and i had eyes on it (it’s “headlights”) for about 8 minutes.
s.D. wouldn’t talk about it. not then or the day after, as i described the incident to a couple of professors in the communication arts department. he couldn’t (or wouldn’t) utter a word about it. i don’t know if he blocked it or remembers it. last i heard he was living in miami. but he would never speak about it, not even to me. 
over the years i have only mentioned this incident to a handful of very close people. the response i got from my professors (mostly sneers and laughter) was enough for me to keep silent all these years.
i never felt fear or threatened. when people mention those feelings during an encounter, or describe abductions, it makes me believe that there are at least two type of aliens. one that is benevolent. and one that is not. i felt this encounter was with a ‘benevolent’ type. and if not aliens, perhaps beings from another dimension…. or even “us” in the far future, time-traveling backwards. i don’t know “who” i saw. but i am definitive about what i saw.
i am by no means an artist, but can describe it. the craft was triangular in shape. maybe 40 feet in diameter(?). the shape of the triangle wasn’t with hard pointed corners, but the corners were “soft” or somewhat rounded. it appeared silvery metallic on top. underneath, it would be hard to know the color, because there were bright lights on the bottom, all around the bottom edge. strangely, i don’t remember that these lights put out much of a glow much beyond the craft. in other words, it wasn’t illuminating the ground. and if memory serves, they weren’t really white, but a variety of blues and greens. the “headlights” on top were a bit wider apart than a standard car’s would be. i clearly remember having that thought as i stood there, (having initially thought this was a car on the distance.) i was close to it (in the stationary car) for about 10 seconds before i got out of the car and it flew away.
content.summary: I was a uwf student in 1979 when i saw a triangular craft hovering over trees, not more than 120 feet away from me.

content.detailedDescription:
I attended the 2015 gathering festival in emery barnes park on saturday, june 20. in the evening i was sitting with a group of friends on the benches, listening to live jazz music, playing with my camera, taking shots of the rainbows in the fountain, trying to avoid snapping pictures of people. i framed the fountain against the backdrop of sky and condo towers, and when i got home, examined my photos. to my surprise, i captured what looks like an slbm (submarine launched ballistic missile). i have seen these launches before, in videos and images, but never witnessed one firsthand. i checked online and found there were no scheduled launches of any other kind on the 21st of june by any space agency worldwide. and yet...

the attached image is a 14 megapixel shot straight from the camera, with no alteration or enhancements other than to circle the object.
content.summary: Similar to ballistic missile of the type fired from submarines

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home from my sisters house on a motorcycle. i was on apple colloney rd. the rd went right next to our school and bassball field. as drove northbound as i drove past the corner wher they meet i saw something to my left so i slowed down turned around and pulled over.  write in front of me was this giant triangular craft. i did see some dim colerd lights i remember thinking their is no noise at all this thing was bigger than the bassball dimond about as thick as a house. their wasno noise at all. 
this happened about 1984 i was a teenager and i can still. see it. for some reason i forgot about it for 20+ years.
content.summary: Huge triangular craft floting above bassball dimond it was as big as the field. no noise at all nothing. i watched it for 15 minuts ithen i went home.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday april 14, 2015 was another occasion of seeing many momentary glimpses in the sky above blue springs lake.  i took two random videos in hopes of catching something.  the first video taken at 3:09 p.M. lasted 13 seconds but i have not noticed anything on it.  the second video taken at 6:41 p.M. lasted 34 seconds.  at first i didn’t see anything… but then i was amazed at how many moving craft there were.  the direction was 342°, at an elevation of 17° from the horizon.  

the image of frame 0:17 contains 101 craft.  in frame 0:21 there are 139 craft.  this means that in 4/60th of a second later 38 more had appeared.

the photomerged image of frames 0:17 and 0:21 has had most of the color removed to facilitate seeing the dots.  since they were faint to begin with, i artificially placed a fine marker dot over each craft to make them more visible.   the darker of the dots in this image are from frame 0:21 as it was layered over the first one.  thus one can see the amount of change in that time as well.

in a matter of only 4/30th of a second, 38 more craft were in the view of the camera, or nearly 40% more.  most of them seem to be heading in their own patterns as there is no consistent direction.  some seem to remain close together, yet others seem to be more independent.  

there were some craft which were obviously larger but fainter and more blurred to see.  frame 6:54 after some enhancement allows one to see the image somewhat better.  however i cropped and greatly edited it to reveal a triangular component to it.  

frame 6:55, or 1/60th of a second later showed yet another larger craft.  further editing shows it to be perhaps of the same nature as the previous one, but from a different view.

finally, frame 14:06 depicts two of the smaller craft in the swarm but which were more readily visible.  while they show up mainly as an elongated dot, and a dot, they nonetheless were elements of the swarm.
    
the hundreds of craft in the video at times seemed to behave like a swarm of instects.  however when analyzed they show no elements of insects.  the focal point of the 300 mm telephoto lens was on infinity, and so what was captured on the film would have been actually covering a distance of 1,024 ft vertical height in the image, at a distance of about 1 mile estimated.  if the distance is accurate, this means that individual craft average about 7.2 feet in diameter.  some were larger, some were smaller.  the larger craft of frames 6:54 and 6:55 would have been approximately 36 feet in diameter.

this is a new development in the observations.  while there have been sometimes multiple craft in video images, this is the first time that this observer has seen so many over blue springs lake, in the hundreds.
content.summary: Hundreds of craft swarming

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were stargazing from our pool last night, when he pointed to a strange little cloud on an otherwise cloudless evening. it was transparent and gray in color that never seemed to break apart or change shape as it moved steadily heading nnw. i noted that it didn't seem to act like a cloud and was moving pretty quickly.

we watched as it moved to pass in front of a very bright star and that's when it got weird. my husband and i both gasped and we both said "are you seeing what i'm seeing?". the only way i can describe what we saw, is that as the cloud passed in front of the "star", the star began moving quickly along within it. the cloud then shrank around the bright star object as it became very bright and seemed to alter direction a bit heading more towards the north. we watched as the object brightened and dimmed, turned back into a small cloud shape, then finally dimmed and disappeared in the distance.

this object could have been seen crossing high above i40 traveling in either direction around the mount juliet, tn area around 10:40 or so last night. hoping we weren't the only ones.
content.summary: Fast-moving cloud-shape engulfs "star", becoming very bright and changes direction

content.detailedDescription:
Out in my back yard with my boyfriend at the time.
sitting on a large rock staring at the stars.
beautiful clear sky.
it was like they hide above us within the patterns of the stars.
a giant triangle shape of stars, like a star pattern, i was admiring the pattern.
when it started to move, it changed shape completley....The stars just rearranged themselves.
i was staring at one one of them particularly, like i could not stop gazing at it.
that one star shot out from the triangle and came straight down from space to ,me......My boyfriend and i ran like hell.
it followed us through the woods and cemetary and into my parents house. 
my parents have seen the lights before and did not seem shocked at all. 
we have had  many experiences. since we were kids. 
my mother and her friends seen a tall alien when she was a teenager.
my brother, father and mother and i all have memories of them in our home, happened more than once. 
i wonder what would have happened if i had just stood on the rock.  i want to remember. i am not scared.
content.summary: Bright stars turning into a ufo event

content.detailedDescription:
Last weekend, my son (12years old) and another boy (9years old)
were outside playing hide and seek with other kids.
stormy weather with much lightning.
observed 4 objects in sky moving around
he ran to get his phone and recorded attached,
three had left, but at 3 seconds into recording,
lightning flashes giving fairly good image of
object.

let me know what you think this is.

regards,

j
content.summary: Son witnessed 4 objects, ran to get phone, one left

content.detailedDescription:
I was about six years old when i saw them for the first time. i was questioning my religion and decided to go into my grandparents forest to pray. well i had a feeling that i should lie down and i guess i fell asleep. next thing i know, this warm blueish light is waking me up and i sat up and two men were standing there (keep in mind, it's about two am in a very small town) and these men were about six feet tall. one had grey hair and the other brown. and i wasn't afraid. i tried to reach out and touch one of them but the brunette said,"don't touch us. you aren't ready for what will happen yet." i said," well then tell me what will happen?" and i don't remember much of the conversation past that, but i have seen one or both of these men throughout my life. i guess the first time i saw one of them, i was still sleeping in a crib. 
this yellow gold colored beam of light came through the roof and the same brunette came through it and he spoke to me and my grandpa has it written in his journal exactally what was said but what amazed me was that a man was able to come through the ceiling and leave no trace when he left. 
and when the two men left after our conversation in the woods, i thought they are so warm and so bright, they are going to burn the forest down. but when i went out to the wood the next day, there was no trace. but i could still feel the energy they left behind. 
i know this sounds crazy but to much has happened to me for this to be unreal. 
one of these beings even stopped me from committing suicide one time.
content.summary: I saw two men and we spoke

content.detailedDescription: I got off of the phone at 11:41 pm and went to let my dog out when i noticed the sand box cover was off.  i went outside to put it on and then looked up at the sky, which was clear finally after days of rain! i could see all of the stars. to my left (the north), in the sky i noticed what i first thought must be a cloud.  i thought it strange though, since the rest of the sky was clear.  when i realized that it was moving faster than a cloud should and started to look more like a fuzzy/hazzy or misty  object instead, i called my husband and daughter outside. it was almost directly overhead when they came out and then a light in the center appeared. a bright, white, non blinking light. it continued to move steadily off to the south west and as it did, then light disappeared and it turned back into the misty looking object instead.  we had to walk up to the front of the house to continue watching, because there was a tree in the way.  it moved off to the southwest until we could not longer see it.  there was a plane in the sky in that direction moving se to nw that i figured must be able to see this thing and wondered what it looked like to those on the plane.
content.summary: Slight glowing mist moving from north to south, then when over head, light appeared in the center before it faded into mist once again.

content.detailedDescription: My dad was outside with his wife and they saw a light when they turned to look they saw a large craft hovering. it made no noise. it had stationary blue lights on top and pulsating white lights around the bottom. suddenly, still without making a sound it zipped to the right, zipped back to the left and that flew away at a crazy speed. my father said he felt it was a craft from the start. while i have believed in ufos since childhood i have alays known my dad to be a skeptic, now he stands outside every night looking for another one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My dad saw this object and he allowed me to share it without his name

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:45pm last night (6-22-15) i stepped out onto my back deck which overlooks the chesapeake bay from the east bank looking west towards annapolis, md. i brought my 10x50 wide angle bushnell binoculars to observe the setting cresent moon. the moons possition in relation to mine was slightly south west at approximatley 15 degrees above horizon. the object i obsrved was at approximately 25 degrees above horizon slightly south west between my possition and the cresent moon. it appeared as a small light cloud round in shape with an opening in the center. (like looking down on the top of a whirl pool or hurricane.) i sighted my binoculars in on the cloud and thats when i observed the light in the center. it appeared to be yellowish in color and solid, no blinking or additional lights like an aircraft would have and it made no sound. i looked around the visible sky to see if any other objects or aircraft might be around and realized that nothing else was flying at the moment. i ran inside and woke my wife to come and witness and observe it. she watched for a minute, maybe two. i then watched it turn from the swirling cloud to what appeared to be a fanned out illuminated cloud in front of it. it became very fuzzy/hazy as it moved farther away. the path was from south to north and slightly west. the whole viewing lasted about 10 minutes from start to finish. just after the object went out of sight, the sky fillied up with about a half a dozen or so aircraft. some were commercial aircraft flying into bwi. one massive aircraft flew from south to north at about 25 degrees above horizon along the bay and then headed due east towards deleware.
 so i have no idea what this object could of been. i watch aircraft an satellites all the the time and i have never seen anything like this befor.
content.summary: Sighted a light density cloud swirl with opening in the middle. sighted with 10x50 wide angle bushnell binoculars and discovered star-like object in center opening of cloud.

content.detailedDescription: It was a cold night in january,earlier that day we just purchased a knew heater-stove it was about two feet by three around with a little piece of fake wood in the bottom it spun around in the bottom,you know so it would look like the fire was burning,anyhow later that night i layed down in my living room a little ways from my big picture window i sleep on a pull out bed,later as i tryed to fall asleep i was just watching the orange lights hit my picture window over and over looked pretty cool,was a knew thing you know bud.It was about midnight or so i was watching these light for about hour or so when a big white beam about a foot in diameter came threw my picture window and landed on my chest paralyzing me i couldn't even think and before i could do anything i was in some strange place with some tall human kind of person standing in front of me,he didnt say a word but i felt at ease tho i was still laying flat just like how i was on my bed,he must of levitated me because i went from this one place to another there was no doors it was about 15 or so feet i guess i could see another room were there were four others already waiting,like they were expecting me or something i went from one place floating ,still laying flat to that table i noticed zeros and ones going back and forth all over on the walls before i was placed on the table it was like they knew the exact height because i didnt go up or down it was on height from one room to the other right to the table they made me feel relaxed they were very ugly with big heads some kind of ears im not sure of the color of there faces they were not small there faces looked alot more human just wrinkley like they were old with marks on them like scars or something. im not sure what happened next tell you the truth because before i knew what was happening it was like a second then i was laying back in my bed,thinking to my self did i just imagine that or wtf just happened. i got up and got something to drink was very thirsty and thought was dry.I got on my computer and went on facebook and spoke with one of my friends his name was orions belt i told him about what just happened it was only 12 30 so people were still up it was friday night so i felt like i wanted to tell someone.After i told him what happened and what they looked like he showed me a picture of some strange humanoid it was a identical match to the ones i saw.He said it was a picture that leonardo davinchy drew and i was like the second one in history to ever see one of these type of aliens he said he envy's me.Yours truly your friend to the end,david c.C
content.summary: Paralized me in bed with light threw window,then was in somekind place with one standing by me 0sand1s on wallsgoing back n forth levitated me to room were there were four others already standing there put me on a table and telephathicly told me i was ok

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to momence from chicago when just south of grant park, il, i started taking photos of the lightning storm. i have several photos leading up to the pyramid shaped lights that show nothing in the air. then several that show a distinct shape of a blue, red, and yellowish lights that is stagnant in the air. it was not visible to the naked eye. the storm was severe and i didn't analyze the photos until i reached my parents' home. i sat in my car trying to explain this with dashboard lights or some other reflection but i'm afraid i'm stumped.
content.summary: Three stagnant lights. couldn't see until i took the photos.

content.detailedDescription:
June 23, 2015
12:30am mst
ne montana near canadian border
2 witnesses watched ufo for approximately 45 minutes. object first appeared as a star on the horizon with two other star-like objects just below and to the right. driving north, to see the northern lights, the witnesses saw the two objects which appeared side-by-side simply disappear. confused about what had just happened they assumed there was a cloud they could not see and continued north. after ten minutes or so the witnesses arrived at their location to watch the northern lights. the driver exited the vehicle and let the dog out to run since it was an isolated area and to stretch and walk around for a minute. the other witness was still in the vehicle looking out at the stars. soon the witness in the car called the other witness over to look at something in the sky. it was then they both saw the object move and realized it wasn't a star after all. the object was a speck of light that appeared to dart about in multiple directions but never left the area. this may sound stupid but it appeared as though the object was being taken for a joy-ride. like a couple of alien teens had snuck out the spaceship for the night and was on the joy ride of their life. it almost appeared as though whomever was in control was just learning how to fly it. it hovered and darted about as though it could do anything and impossible things that no plane, helicopter, drone, or balloon could possibly do. one of the witnesses said it was the nail in the coffin for them. they had watched the object for more than 45 minutes and saw it maneuver in ways that no man made object could possibly achieve. it could go from break neck speed to a stand still object in a blink of an eye. amazing in so many ways. lights changed color but never blinked or pulsated except when it moved really fast, then it glowed somewhat briefly. the witnesses tried to use their phones but found them useless without a signal eight miles from the nearest town. one of the witnesses recorded video on their phone but was only able to get the audio to record because of the darkness at 12:30am and the object being faint to see to begin with. eventually the object moved further north out of view. one witness said they thought the object was shimmering colors in the plasma stream as though it were charging it's batteries.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star-like object "danced" for 45 minutes during northern lights in ne montana.

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was around 9 or 10 years old living in a 2 story apartment building were my aunt and uncle and cousin lived 3 doors down. 
this was the kind of place where every one knew each other, one evening my mother and i noticed something was going on so we went out side to see what was happening, toward the rear of the apt building were people would park their cars.
we see, i would say about 15 to 20 people looking up, i remember looking at my cousin's face as i look up and see it. 
their it was just over the apt building id say like 30 feet above the roof.
it was round and it changed colors while making this spinning sound the exterior was like a glowing multicolor fireball it hovered for about 12 to 15 min or so then all of a sudden it made a sound as it blasted off at high speed into the atmosphere with in seconds it was no longer visible.
the next day the news paper reported homestead air force base was conducting a weather experiment.
it has been 35+ years and my mother and cousin and i have never forgotten this event we witnessed and i am sure the others that experienced this never forgot.
content.summary: Pulsaiting sphere changing  difrent colors for 10 min  then took off

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling from grande prairie ab to edmonton ab @ approx 12:30am - 1:30 am. i had passed valley view ab traveling southbound on hwy 43. i noticed on the east side of the hwy a light in the distance.. as i continued down the hwy the object got bigger. my first though it was ace phone tower. but as i got closer to it and was beside it i coould see the actual size of it was huge! it was a huge slow spinning triangle probably 2 storys tall and the lights were coming off of the corner columns that were twice as tall as the actual craft. in other words the corners were the tallest part at roughly 4 storys.
at first i was still trying to comprehend what i was looking at then the lights started to pulse as it spun and the light then started (my best description) to drip off of the corners and change colors. the dripping colors then faded before the hit the ground. when i saw that and clued in to the fact that this was not from our world i got very scared. i was on a hwy very late at night and only a couple people had passed by. no one slowed down like i did tho... i was the only one that had stopped to get a better look at this thing.
i then stepped on the gas and got out of there quickly... it didn't pursue me and the last time i saw it was as i sped away...
content.summary: Huge triangle with pulsating red-orange light

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch having a cigarette taking my dogs potty, the minute we got outside the dogs looked up and started barking at something in sky, i looked up and saw 2 lights that were not there night before because 2 nights ago i saw the big one, just one and it was really bright and dogs were barking at it do it got my attention. i checked last night thinking i was crazy and it wasn't there until tonight.
i got video from my cell phone and it's not that great, but it looked to me as if there were 3 large white lights and you would see red and red orange with greenish blue every once in a while flash. then i sat and watched as the big one went downwards and i couldn't see it anymore. my daughter watched the big one go down with me, the last video i was recording as the small one went downwards and was going out of my line of sight which took 3 1/2 minutes, all of a sudden i couldn't stop video, my camera ( cellphone) stopped working and we cannot play the video either so i deleted it, but i have the other videos i took. planes fly over sparks all the time, we know planes and these were not planes or helicopters. i do not know what they were but they were off in the distance. i was shocked, panicky, and my daughter told me to make sure i locked the back door ( which we never do because we have 3 pit bulls and it's highly unlikely that anyone would break in due to that)
she's pregnant and she got weirded out. 
i don't know how to explain it it its a feeling like you got a stalker and your being watched. my dogs over last 6 months have been barking at backyard while in the house usually only in evenings or middle of night they'll wake me up barking as my bedroom faces the backyard. i've heard noises out there late at night like banging metal, someone out there but every time i check it stops and doesn't happen again and the dogs run around the yard line they are looking for someone. could be nothing, maybe another animal is what i thought, but as i'm typing this i started thinking about it making it good for, in my opinion, an honorable mention.
i'm not crazy and i don't tell whoppers, i just really honestly don't know what it was.
i have an iphone 6 if you can tell me how to restore the video i deleted, i will and maybe you can get it to work.
content.summary: 2 lights, heading down then disappeared out of my line of sight, i have video, last video didn't work

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 850pm, my daughter and i were taking a walk observing the sunset. a large commercial jet appeared on the west horizon traveling east. while observing the plane, our attention was turned to an object around 40 degrees above the treeline. i noticed the object in stark contrast against the light blue sky and a jet contrail.  the object can only be described as a black star, which began to pulsate dark grey "light", as if it had a back light behind it. the center was total black with irregular edges that were masked by the glow. while using other planes and scattered clouds as a reference point, the altitude seemed extremely high or perhaps even out of orbit. the size of the object was very difficult to estimate due to the glowing effect it had. if you placed a number 2 pencil at arms length against the sky, the eraser would be the same size roughly as the object.

after several minutes of observing, the object remained stationary and appeared to twinkle, and took on the shape of a sombrero hat. despite the object appearing as though it was very far away, we both felt threatened and watched during this time.  the object shifted to the southwest after 5-8 minutes of observation and began to slowly fade until it disappeared entirely.
content.summary: Medium size black object, glowed dark grey/black against blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: Not much to it video says it all, it just stayed in the exact same spot the whole 30 minutes i was there and i just thought it was unusual as it did not move at all and i know air balloons move when the wind is blowing. but i kept an eye on it the whole time i was there working. and i have no idea what it was or i would not bother sending the video, i was downloading pictures from my phone to my computer when i even snapped that i had the video. this is not my first ufo sighting here in texas, here at runaway bay, texas i have witnessed several ufo sightings. though this one was in springtown there is a lot of strange things in our skies. i was attracted to it because of it's shape and the fact it did not seem to move at all. the object never landed or as far as i know even disrupted anyone's day, but i would like to know if anything was ever said about it.
content.summary: I was working, getting a load of salt water from a gas well outside of springtown and i just noticed this object and what got my attention was it was staying exactly in the same spot for at least the 30 minutes i  was there.

content.detailedDescription:
The memories of my childhood and teens began to return in my late 20’s, when long black dreams (where i was in a mist or floating trying to reach for something), began to clear so that i could see the places where my mother had taken me, and the people that called to the elders by means of a sing-song chant. with this chant a portal would open in a wall and an elder would step through.
the first time i met an elder i was five years old, the two years prior the women-with some older girls eight to ten years old-had been training/teaching me to trust and do whatever the elders told me to do. the main symbol they used you had to look at until the parts began to swirl. you would enter that swirling vision, floating, with your every sense alive. then they would touch you and their thoughts became one with yours. they-women or girls-never spoke, only with their touch did you hear their thoughts. i have never felt the power they transferred to me, when we touched, in any other human, nor the knowledge; both would fade after leaving them.
the elder never came through the portal, but motioned for me to come to him. all i could see was a big black robed figure. the woman holding my hand thought to me that this was to be my elder and that i needed to trust and obey all he told me to do, without pause or question. something a five year old, who has been waiting for this moment, was easy and willing to do. i let go and stepped through.
it was as if i was walking on air. i could move but i felt no pressure of up, down, front, back or sideways. it was as if i had become part of everything. he again extended his sleeve. i reach up into it and we merged. it was as if i no longer had a hand, but flowed with his thoughts and all the power and knowledge of the universe was mine for the asking.
  as we began to travel, his thoughts (soothingly) began to flow into my mind, to let me know that to pass this test i needed to remember to focus on the symbol as i had been taught, to the point in which nothing that touched me would be felt or responded to. the travel was breath taking in itself, as we were traveling through the stars without a ship. the universe was ours alone.
as we traveled, he motioned and thought, “we go there.” i saw four stars, everything seemed to move even faster and then i was in a dimly lit room. it was warmer than being in space, like the first warm day in spring.
we waited awhile, and then we moved forward into a room i had not seen there. there was a glass domed chamber table that had glass tubes running into it. i found myself lying on the table (for the first time i heard his thoughts without being touched), “all is well, look up and see our symbol, remember what you have been taught, be in the mist for i will be there for you.”
all our training was done in the nude. this was so every part of our bodies could be in touch with the universe. i traveled there nude and lay there nude. 
i looked up at our symbol until it began to spin and become a spreading whitish gray mist. he was there, a part of the mist, surrounding me, comforting me on my trust in him. then he said i had passed and must return to my body.
i was no longer in the chamber. my elder motioned for me to follow. i could not see where we were going, but he spoke to my mind that we would be watching all the remaining children as they took their test.
without feeling it we had traveled upward. there were some other children there; the place was dark except for the dim light below from the glass chamber. we were not allowed to touch or speak to each other (this was the second test), only watch to see if the other children would pass the first test and join us. there had to more than one chamber. we watched as one child after another appeared in the chamber. they had to remain motionless as either rats or snakes entered and left the chamber. it amazed me that i had never felt them. then a child moved, instantly the snakes struck. there was no more need to see if others passed, the lesson was learned, to fail was to die. yes, i am terrified of things that wiggle or scamper across the floor.
 i have not remembered the travel back, only arriving back and stepping back through the portal, with calming words that said, “when you risk everything, as you must, sometimes you die in the process. the rest must go on for the greater good.”
the woman was there and she touched me, instantly all i seen and done passed to her. she thought, “you have done well. your elder is well pleased. you will begin a study to strengthen what you have already learned.
what i did not understand at the time was that little if any time had passed from the time i entered the portal until i left it.

what brought more of these memories back was an event in my early 30’s while at ft leavenworth. it was a hot summer day, when a voice behind me said one of the sing-song chants. my sweat felt like ice on my skin, but i was not cold. i turned to see a major standing there with a smirk of a smile. nothing was moving around us, we had stepped out of time into another dimension. he never spoke, but i heard every one of his thoughts to me, “we have always known where you were, what you were doing; you will always be one of us” (my parent’s divorced when i was six and my father had custody for several years). that night by an old tree i saw a portal, but i had learned to fear and could not step through.
there is more to the story, but i do not want to bore you. as i hoped earlier, i would like to talk to those you know that would be interested and hopefully could answer some of my questions. i have known since i was a child “we are not alone”. but those few i have found, on the net, have seemed to be like those who claim you are crazy or demon possessed. i would like to meet people like you who look at it all logically, not judging, but observing our history as a whole.
thank you for your time. i hope to hear from you.
content.summary: Read the attachment.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 11 pm  in march i was checking cows on my farm. was waiting for a cow to calve. noticed a light and at the time appeared to be in my dads pasture. thinking it was someone driving i drove an atv. i got to the area 
i was ontop of a hill noticing nothing on ground. i looked up noticed the light. watched it fly away. it was cold out so i then went to bed.
the next night i looked in sky at 8pm seen a light no stars were out yet
watched it all night. till it dissapeared at 3am. the craft had a very bright light. appearing white until closer then dimming to bright yellow.
with the light so bright it is hard to decipher the craft shape size.
i was very mad at first thinking it was a drone or military. but later realized. that this craft was nothing like i have ever seen before. it would hover in one spot from 8 pm till 11 pm. then it took off flying oddly
stopping hover straight up down hover. various flight directons. slow fast
then in a blink of an eye was gone. 

i did not realize forgetting the time it was 4 am. i have seen this light with 2 others. and have seen this every day since march. it is now june 22nd. it is not a plane known to man. i am watching the craft now as i write this. i have used a flashlight to get it to come closer and it does.
at this point iam scared for myself and family. as this craft is at the end of my lane under a mile. hovering 300ft above ground directed at me. light turned red now still same place see black around it where their is no light.
i have filled this report to help the cause.

 and hopefully find out why this craft is at my farm middle know where every night for 4 months.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First light in sky brighter the moon. fly pattern like never seen before

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were on the back deck of our house having a cigarette, my back was directly to the house and one of my sons was in front of me.  he suddenly looks up and says look.
it was a huge craft, moving very slowly and completely silent. no noise whatsoever...Nothing. it was only a few hundred feet over us, if that.  our back of the house is very dark. there was no moon. the only reason we saw it was because it had 2 rows of a blue or grey light that illuminated parts of it and remained constant throughout.  it's underside was so black that without those lights it would have been unnoticed. the detail i observed was that it looked like an old rr trestle, a black metal with huge inlaid bolts. i also noticed the paint or covering of it looked worn off or stripped away in parts, revealing almost a rust color.
it continued on it's course, sw away from raritan bay which is about 1 mile from our residence, it looked either triangular or shaped like an arrowhead. it was moving so slowly i actually ran with it, off our porch into the backyard grass to try and observe more detail. it eventually went out of sight.

my son justin and i were amazed and started comparing notes, about 5 minutes later we either saw another one or that one had doubled back but way off in the distance, to our east.  it was banking to head out over the atlantic ocean.  again, completely silent and this one looked more triangular.  again, the only reason we saw it was because of the two rows of lights along the perimeter.  this one was moving faster than the first, like an airliner, but not very fast.
we live in close proximity to earle naval weapons handling station where several naval vessels occasionally resupply.

what was most eventful to me was the size, it's very slow speed and the complete, utter silence....

i did meekly call our local police station and asked "has anyone reported a ufo" and the officer said no.
content.summary: A huge slow moving black craft

content.detailedDescription: I watched a video from the series unsealed:alien files season1 episode17 and at 16min 50sec its freeze framed on 2 men described as men in black.The witnesses described them as looking alike with no eyebrows and pale white faces.But clearly thats not what they look like in video.So i snapshot on my cell and played around with filters and got something even more interesting.Others have done the same.I have been trying to get pics analyzed to confirm what is seen but everytime i start a dialog with people they suddenly stop replying emails.Will you look into this and confirm please?
content.summary: 2 men featured on an existing video

content.detailedDescription: The kids were playing out and called me to come look at a strange object. since  we live in the san francisco airport flight pattern i assumed it was a plane.I saw three white single lights in a triangle that i thought were planes in formation. i saw two planes leaving the airport and one coming in. then i saw the circular object with three lights flying over the area. it disappeared for a while and then came back. the children said it looked like it landed on the mountain. they became scared and came in the house   i am just wondering if anyone else saw it. i hato  pictures on my cell but i do not know how to download it to site
content.summary: We saw a round object with three large lights above us it moved south and appeared to sit on mountain
